typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_key as string,
		cov_exposure_group_desc as string,
		cov_3ltr_code as string,
		cov_energy_exp_group_desc as string,
		cov_gic_group_code as string,
		cov_layer_group_code as string,
		cov_exposure_group_code as string,
		grp_key as string,
		cov_description as string,
		cov_layer_group_descr as string,
		cov_energy_exp_group_code as string,
		grp_description as string,
		cov_gic_group_desc as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_coverage',
	format: 'query',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_coverage.parquet']) ~> preDimCoverage
preDimCoverage derive(tot_key = 'ALL',
		tot_description = 'All Coverages') ~> derivedTopColumns
derivedTopColumns alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> alterRow
alterRow sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		cov_gic_group_desc as string,
		cov_3ltr_code as string,
		tot_description as string,
		tot_key as string,
		cov_layer_group_descr as string,
		grp_description as string,
		grp_key as string,
		grp_id as long,
		cov_exposure_group_desc as string,
		cov_description as string,
		cov_energy_exp_group_desc as string,
		cov_gic_group_code as string,
		cov_exposure_group_code as string,
		cov_id as long,
		cov_energy_exp_group_code as string,
		cov_key as string,
		cov_layer_group_code as string,
		tot_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['pk_key'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		cov_gic_group_desc,
		cov_3ltr_code,
		cov_layer_group_descr,
		grp_description,
		grp_key,
		cov_exposure_group_desc,
		cov_description,
		cov_energy_exp_group_desc,
		cov_gic_group_code,
		cov_exposure_group_code,
		cov_energy_exp_group_code,
		cov_layer_group_code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimCoverage
